requirements.plaintext: The Subterranean Trials of Drake and Serpent

steps.plaintext: Teleport to the north-most waypoint on Dainichi Mikoshi.
steps.markdown: Teleport to the north-most waypoint on ◀Dainichi Mikoshi▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Dainichi_Mikoshi▷.

steps.plaintext: Head north and glide down to the small island north of Dainichi Mikoshi.
steps.markdown: Head north and glide down to the small island north of Dainichi Mikoshi.

steps.plaintext: Head to the north-most point on the island and use the Phase Gate to travel to the Vishap Research Lab.
steps.markdown: Head to the north-most point on the island and use the ◀Phase Gate▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Phase_Gate▷ to travel to the Vishap Research Lab.

steps.plaintext: Follow the path and talk to the Shade of Tokoyo to start the quest. (Must be during "Evernight" as quest icon won't appear during "Whitenight")
steps.markdown: Follow the path and talk to the Shade of Tokoyo to start the quest. (Must be during "Evernight" as quest icon won't appear during "Whitenight")
